fileSamples.statement:
sb ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘
⊆ sb ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ∪ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘
  ∪ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ sb.

⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ sb ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ∪ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘
  ∪ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ sb.

sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘
⊆ sb ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ∪ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘
  ∪ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ sb.

⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ sb
⊆ sb ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ∪ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘
  ∪ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ sb.
fwbob ⊆ fwbob ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb.
sb ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⊆ fwbob.
⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ fwbob.
sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⊆ fwbob.
⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ⊆ fwbob.
⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⊆ fwbob ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb.

sb ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ∪ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘
∪ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ⊆ sb.
(WF : Wf G) : fwbob ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ fwbob ⨾ ⦗E⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : sb ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ∪ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘
∪ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ sb
⊆ ⦗E⦘
  ⨾ (sb ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ∪ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘
     ∪ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘
∪ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘
∪ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ∪ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘
  ⨾ ((⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘
     ∪ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘
     ∪ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ∪ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘)
    ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : bob ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ bob ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold bob.
rewrite (wf_fwbobE WF), wf_sbE.
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : fwbob ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ (fwbob ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗E⦘ ⨾ fwbob ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ fwbob ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
fwbob ∪ (⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⊆ fwbob ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb.
good_ctx (fun r : relation actid => r ⨾ ⦗W⦘).

(bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ bob⁺ ⨾ (⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

forall k : relation actid,
k ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ bob⁺ ⨾ (⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ->
((bob ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ k) ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ bob⁺ ⨾ (⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
intros k H.
rewrite !seqA; rewrite H; clear k H.
relsf; unionL.
arewrite(bob ⊆ bob＊) at 1; relsf.
sin_rewrite bob_in_sb.
generalize (@sb_trans G); ins; relsf.
basic_solver 12.
arewrite (bob ⊆ bob⁺); basic_solver 12.
generalize (@sb_trans G); basic_solver 12.

⊆ bob⁺ ⨾ (⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

relsf; unionL.

sin_rewrite bob_in_sb.

basic_solver 12.
arewrite (bob ⊆ bob⁺); basic_solver 12.
generalize (@sb_trans G); basic_solver 12.

(H : transitive sb) : (⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ sb ⨾ (⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ bob⁺ ⨾ (⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

(fwbob ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb)⁺ ⊆ fwbob⁺ ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb.
fileSamples.proofString:
apply ct_ind_left with (P:= fun r =>  r).
by auto with hahn.
by arewrite (fwbob ⊆ fwbob⁺); basic_solver 12.
intros k H.
rewrite H; clear k H.
relsf; unionL.
by arewrite (fwbob ⊆ fwbob＊); relsf; basic_solver 12.
sin_rewrite (fwbob_in_sb).
generalize (@sb_trans G); ins; relsf; basic_solver 12.
arewrite (⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⊆ ⦗R⦘).
basic_solver.
sin_rewrite fwbob_r_sb.
by arewrite (fwbob ⊆ fwbob⁺); basic_solver 21.
generalize (@sb_trans G); basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement: good_ctx (fun r : relation actid => r).
fwbob ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⊆ fwbob⁺ ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb.

forall k : relation actid,
k ⊆ fwbob⁺ ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb ->
(fwbob ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ k ⊆ fwbob⁺ ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb.

intros k H.
rewrite H; clear k H.
relsf; unionL.
by arewrite (fwbob ⊆ fwbob＊); relsf; basic_solver 12.
sin_rewrite (fwbob_in_sb).
generalize (@sb_trans G); ins; relsf; basic_solver 12.
arewrite (⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⊆ ⦗R⦘).
basic_solver.
sin_rewrite fwbob_r_sb.
by arewrite (fwbob ⊆ fwbob⁺); basic_solver 21.
generalize (@sb_trans G); basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement: fwbob ⊆ fwbob⁺ ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb.
(⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⊆ fwbob⁺ ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb.
sb ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sb.
transitive sb -> sb ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sb.
⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⊆ bob⁺.
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite (⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⊆ bob).
apply ct_step.

fileSamples.statement: bob ⊆ bob⁺.
fwbob⁺ ⊆ bob⁺.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold bob.
apply clos_trans_mori.
eauto with hahn.
